pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detecting Changes in Autocorrelated and Fluctuating Signals // Detect abrupt changes in time series with local fluctuations as a random walk process and autocorrelated noise as an AR(1) process. See Romano, G., Rigaill, G., Runge, V., Fearnhead, P. (2021) doi:10.1080/01621459.2021.1909598.
